description: Store and retrieve semantic memories using advanced vector search and intelligence-driven insight extraction. Organize knowledge across projects with secure access controls and comprehensive system health monitoring. Optimize your information flow by detecting duplicates and analyzing usage patterns for better decision support.

configSchema.name: lanonasis-enterprise-mcp

tools.name: list_memories
tools.description: List memories with pagination and filters

tools.name: create_memory
tools.description: Create a new memory with vector embedding

tools.name: create_memory_chunked
tools.description: Create memory with auto-chunking for large content

tools.name: get_memory
tools.description: Retrieve a specific memory by ID

configSchema.description: Lanonasis Enterprise MCP - Memory Intelligence with AI-powered analysis, circuit breakers, and reliability patterns

capabilities.name: list_memories
capabilities.description: List memories with pagination and filters. Returns paginated results sorted by the specified field.

capabilities.name: create_memory
capabilities.description: Create a new memory with automatic vector embedding generation for semantic search. The content is processed to create searchable embeddings.

capabilities.name: create_memory_chunked
capabilities.description: Create memory entries from large content by automatically splitting into multiple chunks. Each chunk preserves context with overlap and is tagged for reassembly. Use this for documents, long conversations, or any content exceeding 8000 characters.

capabilities.name: get_memory
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific memory by its unique identifier. Returns full memory details including content, metadata, and timestamps.

capabilities.name: update_memory
capabilities.description: Update an existing memory's content, title, type, tags, or metadata. Only provided fields are updated; others remain unchanged.

capabilities.name: delete_memory
capabilities.description: Permanently delete a memory by its ID. This action cannot be undone.

capabilities.name: search_memories
capabilities.description: Search memories using semantic vector search. Finds memories with similar meaning to the query, not just keyword matches.

capabilities.name: search_lanonasis_docs
capabilities.description: Search the Lanonasis documentation for guides, API references, and SDK information.

capabilities.name: list_api_keys
capabilities.description: List all API keys for the authenticated user. Shows key metadata but not the secret values.

capabilities.name: create_api_key
capabilities.description: Create a new API key for programmatic access. The secret is only shown once upon creation.

capabilities.name: delete_api_key
capabilities.description: Permanently delete an API key. This cannot be undone. Applications using this key will lose access.

capabilities.name: rotate_api_key
capabilities.description: Generate a new secret for an existing API key. The old secret becomes invalid immediately.

capabilities.name: revoke_api_key
capabilities.description: Deactivate an API key without deleting it. The key can potentially be reactivated later.

capabilities.name: list_projects
capabilities.description: List all projects accessible to the user, optionally filtered by organization.

capabilities.name: create_project
capabilities.description: Create a new project for organizing memories and API keys. Projects help separate concerns and manage access.

capabilities.name: get_organization_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about an organization including settings, members count, and usage limits.

capabilities.name: get_health_status
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive system health status including API, database, and service availability.

capabilities.name: get_auth_status
capabilities.description: Get current authentication status, user information, and access level.

capabilities.name: get_config
capabilities.description: Retrieve a configuration setting by key. Returns the current value and metadata.

capabilities.name: set_config
capabilities.description: Update a configuration setting. Some settings may require admin access.

capabilities.name: intelligence_health_check
capabilities.description: Check health status and availability of AI intelligence services including embedding and analysis endpoints.

capabilities.name: intelligence_suggest_tags
capabilities.description: Get AI-powered tag suggestions for a memory based on its content. Uses natural language understanding to recommend relevant tags.

capabilities.name: intelligence_find_related
capabilities.description: Find semantically related memories using vector similarity search. Discovers connections between memories based on meaning.

capabilities.name: intelligence_detect_duplicates
capabilities.description: Detect potential duplicate memories using semantic similarity analysis. Helps identify redundant content for cleanup.

capabilities.name: intelligence_extract_insights
capabilities.description: Extract actionable insights and summaries from memories using AI analysis. Great for decision support and knowledge synthesis.

capabilities.name: intelligence_analyze_patterns
capabilities.description: Analyze usage patterns and trends across memories over time. Identifies what topics you focus on and how usage evolves.

capabilities.name: memory_stats
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive statistics about memory usage including counts by type, storage used, and activity metrics.

capabilities.name: memory_bulk_delete
capabilities.description: Delete multiple memories at once. This is a destructive operation that cannot be undone.
